title: Shutter problem
body:
Hi,
I'm having this problem with my lol game: 
When the game is installed on my HDD drive, i'm experiencing every 5 or 6 seconds very short image freezes, regardless on how much 'action' is going on that moment in game, or regardless which video settings i'm using. 
When I Install the same game on my C drive (which is a 100GB SSD drive with my OS) the game runs perfectly smooth.
I also have 8gb ram memory and I defragedmy HDD drive so I really dont know what the problem can be.

Any help?
Cheers

replies.body:
You could be having some hardware issues here that's not able to pull data properly, but there could be more minor causes of this like driver issues.  For a start, some fps issues occurring have been due to the [Xbox Game Bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html)  which was auto-enabled after a recent Windows 10 update and causing some freezing.  Disabling that could help.

If the issue persists, give our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide a go to rule out any other possibilities.  Hopefully, this will get you squared away!
